title: Old type ID / Tuscan woodtype
content:
I like so much this type.  
There is a font of it?  
Thank you in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [alfbaeto.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045359/http:/typophile.com/files/alfbaeto_0.jpg) | 419.16 KB |
author: Gennariello

comments.content:
Yes, so sorry.  
I have added it.
[Tuscan style fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045359/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/tuscan/) - there's no exact match but it may be the nearest you'll get.
